New Haven City Transformation Plan

The City of New Haven, in partnership with DataHaven, is piloting an online dashboard that makes tracking progress on key indicators of well-being and program performance easy and transparent.

Click or tap on a card to learn more about work in that sector. Click on a button below to filter cards for that sector.

Key

  • trending upward
  • trending downward
  • no significant trend
  • positive change
  • negative change
  • neutral / no change
